name: sports-tracker
description: Sports Match Tracker with React and Node.js

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.client:mock: cd client && cross-env VITE_USE_MOCK_DATA=true VITE_ENABLE_ERROR_LOGGING=true VITE_FALLBACK_TO_MOCK_DATA=true npm run dev
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run install-all && npm run build
